plot: When a nurse is found murdered, the doctor she worked for is accused of the crime. A reporter, who's attracted to the doctor's daughter, sets out to prove his innocence.
title: Behind Jury Doors
plot_es: When a nurse is found murdered, the doctor she worked for is accused of the crime. A reporter, who's attracted to the doctor's daughter, sets out to prove his innocence.
plot_en: When a nurse is found murdered, the doctor she worked for is accused of the crime. A reporter, who's attracted to the doctor's daughter, sets out to prove his innocence.
